...and just living in a lovely bubble where there are no politics whatsoever. this would probably make me feel less stressed and anxious.
i just scroll through twitter each day feeling more and more stressed. considering banning myself from twitter and news sites for a while...
and the most stressful thing is *i would really like to do something about this*, but there's seemingly nothing i can do
And the last thing on anyone's mind is global warning, despite effective action on it needing to happen right now. Or yesterday, ideally.
Meanwhile, our Thatcherite PM is angling to sell off the NHS, acceding to racists and kowtowing to despots.
Really horrified by what Trump's doing. I think it's fair and accurate at this point to call him a fascist.
I don't know if anyone has already mentioned this but everything is well and truly going to shit, politics-wise, isn't it?

An actual fascist replied to my last tweet. My confusion at the BBC news coverage doesn't mean I sympathise with your love of strongmen mate
Unsurprised by HMP Birmingham riots. Not going to expand on that via social media though. Dunno why BBC aren't covering it on their website.
@tomburplebri I found it implausible that that would cause an immediate complete reversal of anybody's values. That's not how people work!
@tomburplebri i was just using a score as shorthand for my feelings. I do like the signature one life left 7/10 for everything.
@tomburplebri I did weirdly quite enjoy a lot of it despite this tbf. Battle scenes were great. So maybe 5/10 is a bit harsh.
@tomburplebri with other characters, like Jin + Cassius, their motivations do a 180 flip halfway through so they don't make sense as people.
@tomburplebri I feel like we get a sense of what sort of person Han is. With some of the main characters in rogue one there's just...nothing
@tomburplebri I dunno, maybe. What would prior knowledge have helped with?
@CiceroTweets Fair point, usually there's some good lines and you care a bit about some of the characters though!
on the plus side, you do feel like you're in the star wars universe (despite it being tonally darker) - not a marvel movie set in space
#RogueOne - final third was good, the droid was pretty funny. Zero characterisation, shoddy dialogue, kind of nonsensical in places. 5/10
Still think Man City will win this. This tweet is going to look pretty damn prescient when they're 4-2 up after 84 minutes.

What I'm saying is, it's a shit but psychologically revealing insult.
Helps squash everything to fit your worldview that we are all secretly self-interested & don't give a shit about anyone else, reinforcing it
